Fighter.Basic: Basic level of Fighter. Up's Hero's Strength at 10%
Fighter.Low: Low level of Fighter. Up's Hero's Strength at 20%
Fighter.Medium: Medium level of Fighter. Up's Hero's Strength at 30%
Fighter.High: High level of Fighter. Up's Hero's Strength at 40%
Fighter.Best: Best level of Fighter. Up's Hero's Strength at 50%

Wizard.Medium: Medium level of Wizard. Up's Hero's Willpower at 30%
Wizard.High: High level of Wizard. Up's Hero's Willpower at 40%
Wizard.Best: Best level of Wizard. Up's Hero's Willpower at 50%

Archer.High: High level of Archer. Up's Hero's Dexterity at 40%
Archer.Best: Best level of Archer. Up's Hero's Dexterity at 50%
